about_the_game:
You may know RunMan from his appearance as a playable character in Super Meat Boy. Or you are a true indie gaming hipster and know him from even earlier.

An epic collaboration between Tom Sennett (Deepak Fights Robots) and Maddy Thorson (TowerFall, Celeste), RunMan: Race Around the World is a platformer with an emphasis on speed and flow.

To get a good score on each course, you have to run through it really fast without stopping. The actual scoring is a bit more complex than that, but that's basically it.

You can't die, because dying's not fun.



Features:
  • Run through 35+ levels across 6 unique and preposterous zones!
  • Complete ridiculous feats of speed to earn shiny medals!
  • Unlock 4 lovable secret characters and probably some other stuff!
  • Colorful, bright, crude, colorful graphics!
  • Classic tunes of phonograph-era folk, blues, jazz, and more!
  • You can't die!



This is a port of the original RunMan: Race Around the World (released in 2009), which fixes a number of technical issues that were encountered on modern systems. It's been optimized to support all kinds of screen sizes, and gamepads, and it has an overhauled audio system to keep everything running smoothly. All the game's original art, gameplay, and content are here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card

reviews:
“If you don't download and enjoy RunMan: Race Around the World... you are a f*cking idiot.”
Destructoid

“Elicits a kind of primal joy in me that I was worried had left long ago.”
TIGSource

“I can't see a thing to not like about this.”
Rock Paper Shotgun
short_description: The beloved indie classic, ready to run on Steam for the first time. Dash, jump, and bounce as the invincible RunMan across 6 unique worlds. Earn medals, unlock secret characters, and become the fastest! A collaboration between Tom Sennett and Maddy Thorson.
